name: Front Desk Voice Agent
description: Handles inbound calls with greeting, intent detection, routing, and message taking.

name: Inbox Management Agent
description: Processes incoming emails, categorizes, drafts responses, and manages follow-ups.

name: Invoicing Automation Agent
description: Creates invoices, sends reminders, tracks payments, and reconciles with accounting.

name: Conference Operations Agent
description: Manages multi-party calls, handles routing, recording, and transcript generation.

name: Documentation Agent
description: Creates, updates, and maintains documentation with version control.

name: Research Agent
description: Conducts web research, synthesizes information, and generates cited reports.
